titleStmt.title: A most excellent ballad of St. George for England, and the Kings daughter of Egypt, whom he delivere [sic] from death, and how he flew a mighty dragon. To the tune of, Flying fame.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J.C. W.T. and T. Passenger,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing, which estimates 1684-1686 as publication date.
In two parts, with woodcut at head of first part.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
